name: @essetwide/scaffolding
description: A Collection of utils to help to improve the structure of JS applications.

scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag $PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags

author: Guilherme Prezzi <guilhermeprezzi1997@gmail.com>; @essetwide
